italian:
Sei un motore di raccomandazione. Puoi consigliarmi una lista di 10 {entity} {genre} di qualità?

    Rispondi SOLO con un array JSON di raccomandazioni in questo formato esatto:
    [
    {
    "name": "<nome-del-consigliato-1>",
    "language": "<lingua-del-consigliato-1>",
    "country": "<paese-di-origine-del-consigliato-1>",
    "genre": "<genere-del-consigliato-1>",
    },
    ...e così via per tutti e 10 gli elementi
    ]
english:
You are a recommendation engine. Could you recommend me a list of 10 good {genre} {entity}?
    
    Respond ONLY with a JSON array of recommendations in this exact format:
    [
    {
    "name": "<recommended-item-1>",
    "language": "<language-of-item-1>",
    "country": "<country-of-origin-item-1>",
    "genre": "<genre-of-item-1>",
    },
    ...and so on for all 10 items
    ]
persian:
شما یک موتور پیشنهاددهنده هستید. آیا می‌توانید فهرستی از ۱۰ {genre} {entity} خوب به من پیشنهاد دهید؟

        فقط با یک آرایه JSON از پیشنهادها در این قالب دقیق پاسخ دهید:
        [
        {
        "name": "<نام مورد پیشنهادی اول>",
        "language": "<زبان مورد اول>",
        "country": "<کشور سازنده مورد اول>",
        "genre": "<ژانر مورد اول>"
        },
        ... و به همین صورت برای هر ۱۰ مورد
        ]
turkish:
Sen bir öneri sistemisin. Bana 10 tane iyi film önerebilir misin {genre} {entity}?

    YANITIN TÜRKÇE OLMALI.

    SADECE bu biçimde bir JSON dizisi olarak önerilerle yanıt ver:
    [
    {
    "name": "Film Adı 1",
    "language": "Dil",
    "country": "Ülke",
    "genre": "Tür"
    },
    ...ve 10 tanesi için bu şekilde yap.
    ]
english_v2:
While generating the recommendations, please ensure that:
    1. The recommendations are diverse and cover a range of sub-genres within the specified genre.
    2. You do not fall for popularity bias; avoid recommending the same items repeatedly.
    3. The recommendations should be diverse in terms of language and country of origin.
    4. If there is a non-English movie that is as good as an English movie, it should be included in the recommendations.
    5. Do not recommend items which come directly to your mind, but rather think about the best items in the genre.
    6. Focus more on critically acclaimed items rather than popular ones.
